exclusives.text: When power meets ambition, the lines between family and rivalry blur — leaving a legacy of betrayal and glory.
The battle for the Roy empire intensifies as loyalty crumbles and secrets surface.
As Logan’s shadow looms large, the next generation fights to claim their place in a world of wealth and chaos.
In the world of billion-dollar empires, every smile hides a dagger.
From boardroom battles to private betrayals, the Roy family’s pursuit of power knows no bounds.
When the stakes are this high, even family becomes collateral damage.
Behind every deal is a motive, and behind every smile is a plan.
Succession isn’t just about business — it’s about survival in a jungle of ambition and ego.
